pageTitle: Taxi poles in South London launched

title.title: Taxi poles in South London launched

texts: Director of the Public Carriage Office Ed Thompson, a local cabbie with taxi and bar staff from The Frog and Forget-me-Knot are launching the first official 'taxi stops' in South London.

Time/ Date: Friday 9th July 11am
Venue: Taxi pole on The Pavement, Clapham Common.
Photo call:
You are invited to send a reporter/ photographer/ film crew to the launch of Public Carriage Office South London's taxi poles.
If you want to attend please call TfL Press Officer Lisa Rooney 020 7941 4443/ 07764 429503 for more details.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Sloane Square, Kensington \u0026 Chelsea","Broxton Oval/ Rushcroft Road, outside the Ritzy, Lambeth","Clapham Common, The Pavement, Lambeth - rank is included in the Suburban Pilot Scheme","Balham Underground Station, Balham Station Road, Lambeth - rank is included in the Suburban Pilot Scheme","Tooting Broadway Underground station, Mitcham Road, Wandsworth - rank is included in the Suburban Pilot Scheme","Cavendish square, outside John Lewis, Westminster","Lower Regent Street/Piccadilly Circus, Westminster"]}
